name: Estrasol
description: We are a company dedicated since 1996 to consultancy in BPM (Business Process Management), document management, ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning), CRM (Customer Relationship Management) and development of websites optimized to attract the audience you want. We develop mobile apps for IOS and Android. We design, manufacture and implement multi-service electronic kiosk solutions for governments and companies.
